TopicTitle: Landing on the Mun part 2 tutorial?

Articles.Content: Hi I'm very new to KSP, and I found the new tutorials in .17 extremely helpful. One problem though. I complete "Landing on the Mun Part 1" but it doesnt unlock part 2, and i didnt see it in the list of tutorials. So i was wondering if Part 2 even exists.

The tutorial system was only recently created, so not all the tutorials are implemented.

As far as I know, there are only the two vanilla tutorials: Orbiting and LotM.

Someone might have created more elsewhere on the forums, and in the How-To section of the forums, there are some nice text tutorials.

HarvesteR said he'd rather have few well-written tutorials than lots of poorly written ones, so they only had time to add those you have in 0.17.

User-made tutorials are a possibility, but without proper documentation, we have to guess how to create them, so it may take some time as well.
Thanks guys. I actually figured it out. These game is fantastic. I'm still tackling landing on the mun, while everyone else is landing on Duna
That's ok, work at your pace. The important part is that you are having fun. You will eventually get there, remember that a lot of the community has been playing this game since it came out.
